entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
